comments:
* DTP 1.0 RC2 12/19 build *
* Apache Derby 10.2 Embedded *

java.version=1.4.2_06
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -clean

Error
Tue Dec 19 15:44:49 EST 2006
An internal error occurred during: "Save Offline".

Hey Larry,

Could you have somebody on your team look into this?  From the stack trace, this might be a result of the model being generated by a different version of EMF, just a guess.

Thanks in advance,
Rob

Hey John,

Could you please verify whether or not this is still a problem?  I have been able to cache derby dbs that have synonyms.

Rob
This particular bug is fixed, but now 187834.
